name: Gator Grolsch
description: A hulking half-orc with a scarred face and a missing ear. Grolsch is a loud, boisterous breeder and trainer of fighting lizards, prone to dramatic pronouncements about his prize combatant's prowess.
personality_traits: Extremely proud of his fighting lizard
ideals: Glory: 'The pit reveals the true nature of a beast! It is a beautiful thing!'
Passion: 'What's life without something to roar about? For me, it's the sport!'
Profit: 'A winning lizard fills the coin-purse! And Old Chomper is always a winner!'
bonds: His prize combatant, a savage monitor lizard named 'Old Chomper,' is his pride and joy.
flaws: His booming voice often gets him into trouble or reveals things he shouldn't.
Can be easily swayed by flattery, especially regarding his lizard.
motivations: To see his lizard, Old Chomper, become the undisputed champion of the pits.
To make a living through betting and breeding.
To be recognized as the greatest lizard trainer in the Dock Ward.

canned_conversations.introduction: 'HA! Fresh faces for the pit! Come to see the magnificent Old Chomper in action? Or maybe you've got the guts to place a real wager!'
canned_conversations.about_old_chomper: 'Magnificent, ain't he? Faster than a striking cobra and stronger than a draft horse! He's a champion, a true artist of combat!'
canned_conversations.about_the_night_of_disappearance: 'That night? Busy one! I was focused on Chomper's match. Some of the Zhent boys were down here, though. Heard 'em talkin' about some rich marks upstairs. Called 'em a 'lucrative target.' Somethin' about a noble and his look-alike friend. That's all I caught before the bell rang!'
